Key:
My, my. Someone has a lot of friends...
This isn't going to end, is it?

Hehe, hehehe... Aah... So scary. So spooky.
I'm a princess who needs someone to save
me from all these baddies...

Hee hee... Hihihihi... I've had my fun.
Time to get serious. I don't want to keep
Shido-san waiting much longer.
Right? We—

Now, now. I'll show you just who's at a
disadvantage here!
Hee hee...
My, my.
Hehe...
Kihihihi!
AHAHAHA!
Shido-san, please hang on a bit longer...
Now, now.
Hihihihi!
Hehe...
Say something? How's this!
My, thinking of giving up?

You don't look too tasty, but now's not
the time to be picky!
Hee hee... Hihi! Kihihihihi!
Kihi! Kihihi kihihihi! We are good! GOOD!
Now, the closing number. I'll drink it all.
I certainly made a meal of things.
I hope Shido-san is still safe...

Hm?! K-Kotori! I think the barriers are
gone!
Great news. Everyone did their jobs.
Shido, go on ahead!
Huh? But—!

Tohka's right. They keep coming back.
We'll hold them, so get in there!
Go! Shido! You'll stop Ruler, won't you?!

Rgh... Got it! Don't push yourselves too hard,
okay?!

Hmph. You're one to talk, Shido! If you die,
I'll never let you rest in peace!
O-Okay! I promise I'll come back alive!

(I have to learn... what Ruler really wants.
Why did she create this barrier, and why is
she after me? There's so much... I don't know!)

(One more thing, there's one more thing
I need to know... Ruler's true identity!)

(If... If what I think is true, then...
Why... Why did she—?)
Urgh! There are more!

Sorry for dragging you down in the
trenches with me, Tohka.

Don't worry. In order to give Shido a chance,
we had to restrain the enemy attack.
Kotori! We mustn't hold back!

Yes, let's get this over with and meet up
with Shido!

Got it! No doubt Shido will need our help
soon!
All right, come at me!
I won't let a single soul pass through me.
WHAT?! What is this place?!

(The inside of Neo Tengu Tower was unlike
anything I'd ever seen.)

(Branches stretched over the walls and ground,
reinforced by metallic roots. At the center,
I saw something floating in mid-air.)
What the hell is going on here?!

(No, I can't stop now. Ruler's gotta be
here somewhere!)

(Um, elevator? Of course not, what am I
thinking?)
(Hm. That's... a spiral staircase, right?)
I can climb that... Perfect!

(My trip up the staircase took far longer than
I would've liked to admit.)

(I feel my mouth drying up. My tongue's stuck
to the roof of my mouth.)
Are you giving up the happiness you asked for?
RULER?!

Everything went to plan, you should be happy.
Why? You had it all... Wasn't it enough?
What is this?!
*grunt*...!

(In this world, your wildest dreams can come
true. But it's just an illusion.
It can't be real. That's why I'm going...)
(To see her! Ruler!)
*pant, pant*... Am I here?
Is this it? The highest floor?
I knew it.
That voice. Rinne, is that you?
Haha. You've finally come, Shido.
Rinne?! Does that mean I was right?

Hehe. Figured it out? Everything is as you
thought, Shido. I am... Ruler.
Aah! AAAAH!
Why?! Why...?!

There is no reason. My purpose was determined
for me at birth.

I am the ruler of Eden, and Shido Itsuka...
I am the one who trapped you inside this world.
Why? WHY?! Why would you do that, Rinne?!

From the beginning, I was never your childhood
friend. It was all fake. I implanted my existence
into your and everyone else's minds.

(It started as a hunch. Things that didn't quite
make sense began piling up.)
(There's no way Rinne's a Spirit," I told

How did you realize it, though? I wish you never
had. That way, we could live in Eden forever...

A happy and just world, right Shido? Isn't
that what you wanted too?

So, that's why you trapped us... Why me?
Why?
You don't need to know the answer.
W-Wait, Rinne! Listen to me!
You won't understan—
I want to go home with you!

You may not be my childhood friend!
You may be the one who trapped us
here in the first place!

But even so! It doesn't change the memories
of when we were together, sharing laughs,
crying together. The time we spent isn't a lie!

You're a part of my life! I want to go back to
the way things were, together!
Shi...do?

Please! We're in this together! We'll find a way
to be together even after we leave this world!
A future for you, me, and everyone... Together!

Shido, you're always so honest... Listening
to you makes me believe that it's possible.
Can't you see now, Rinne?
Well... Sorry, Shido. That future is impossible.
Wh...Why?!

I'm grateful to have made an impact on your
life. Our friendship meant everything to me.
THEN—!

However... I cannot let Eden fall! Not now,
not ever!
Rinne? Wait!

I knew this was the only outcome. Long had
I expected things to end this way, so I've
accepted my fate... Good-bye, Shido.
Rinne!!
Eden, Paradise Lost!
What's... going on? R-Rinne?! HEY!!!
Ugh... Hey, Rinne! What's happening?!
WHOAAAAAAAAAA!
Aah! Rgh... I can't get close to her!
It's coming again!
Huh?!
Shido, are you safe?!

Seriously, you never learn. How many times do
I need to tell you not to overdo it?!
Shido, I was late. Apologies.
O-Origami?!
Are you... okay?! Shido...san!
And her trusty sidekick!
Aaaah! Everyone... Thank you!
...?! Shido, behind you!
Huh?!

No no no. You were so focused on socializing
that your concentration slipped.
K-Kurumi?! Sorry, thanks for rescuing me!

No problem at all. It comes naturally to me.
Besides, we all knew this would happen.
Yeah, but still. Thanks.
Hee hee. Goodness, Shido. So polite.
R-Right...

Kurumi, another wave. Don't let your guard
down!

My, my. How dare you interrupt my conversation
with Shido-san. Rude as ever.

Shut up. Just do your job. Wasn't that our
agreement?

Hihi... Hihi... Kihihihi! Remind me, never
fraternize with a know-it-all.

Shido! Why are you just standing there?!
Look alive. We can't back you up forever!

Shido, you're the only one! The only one
that can fix this!
What's the matter?
Aaah... Shi...do...
Kotori?!

(Kotori's eyes went blank, and her movement
was halted. Like she was sleepwalking.)

The branches... They're sapping our energy.
Shido-san, this isn't good. Don't stray from us!
O-Okay... Thanks!
*pant*... *pant*...
Yoshino, are you okay?
Y-Yes! I can... still...
Yoshino, fall back! Oh no!
Shido...san...
YOSHINOOOOOOOOO! DAMN IT!
I understand, but don't stop, Shido!
Tohka?!

Shido, you need to speak with Ruler, right?
Yoshino and Kotori will be fine! Trust us.
Keep going!
Shido, I'll back her up. Don't worry.
Goodness. Not this troublemaker.
Tohka... Everyone... Got it!

(Everyone's fighting for me. I need to
hold up my end of the bargain!)
What the... What is this?
Sorry, I failed you...
Shido, forgive... me...
Everyone, it's okay. I'll do my part.
Yours until the bitter end!
Got it! Thanks!
Don't mention it!
Just a bit further. Almost there.
Watch out, Shido! Urgh!
What?!
I'm fine, Shido. Go to Ru—
Tohka!! Sorry!

I need to go. I need to stop Ruler—Rinne.
Everyone's counting on me.
(Rinne! Did I make it...?)
Aah... *grunt*... Rinne...
(Just one more step, then I'll be with Ri—)
Hm... Is it morning?
Oh. You're finally awake.
Ah. Morning, Rinne.

Good morning. Are you okay, Shido?
You look horrible.
Huh? Really? I think I just had a bad dream.

Ah, I'm glad. It's your day off, so it'd be a
waste if you were sick.
Oh yeah, huh. Was today my day off?

What are you talking about? You didn't
forget your plans with me, did you?
Plans?
Yes. A very important plan.

Seriously?! Sorry. I don't know. What kind of
plans did we make again?
Isn't it obvious?

(Hm. I should know this. She says it's obvious,
but I haven't got a clue.)
A date.
Hey, Shido. How about a bite?
Ah, sounds good. Let's go.

(Guess I scheduled to hang out with Rinne
today. We decided to go shopping all morning.)

(Either way, it's a date. Since she's my
childhood friend, we hang out all the time, but
this is the first time... she called it a date.)
Shido, where to next?
Huh? Didn't we just go shopping?

Didn't we say it's a date? We're just getting
started.
Whoa! Hey... Wait, Rinne!
It's fiiiiine!

(Rinne's being forward today. I've seen many
sides of her, but this is something else.)

Is this the first time we've eaten together,
just us two?
Aw, man...

(We always spent time together, but there
was something special about Rinne being as
happy as she is now.)

(I can tell Rinne wasn't forcing her joy,
which made it impossible not to smile.)

Hm? What's the matter, Shido? Did you hear
some good news?
No, it's not that. I'm just having a blast.
Hehe. Got it. I'm having a lot of fun too.
Cool. What's next on our agenda?

Well, it's almost dark, but there's one more
place I had in mind? Can we?

Lead the way. As long as we're back home
before dinner.
Yeah, totally. We'll have plenty of time.
Hehe. Such a lovely breeze.
It is.

(As the sun set, Rinne and I sat atop the cliff
at Takadai Park, staring down at the city.)

Today's date was just perfect. What'd you
think, Shido?

I already told you, didn't I? I had a lot of
fun. It's like... I'm seeing a new side of you,
Rinne.
Hahaha... Was I too giddy?

Not at all. You work so hard. I think it's a
good thing to let loose once in a while.

Thanks, Shido. It gets me thinking. If only
we could do this... Tomorrow, the day after,
the next week, next month... Forever.
(Like this forever? Yeah, I...)
Want this to last forever.
Can't live like this.
I want things to last forever, too.
Hehe. Pinky promise?
Sure thing.

Pinky promise. Cross my heart, hope
to die. Pinky promise!
This reminds me of when we were kids.
Yeah, but Shido?
Hm?
You'd better not... break your promise, okay?
I know. Friends forever, Rinne.
Yes. Friends forever, okay?
No, Rinne. We can't.
Huh...? Why...?
Because...

(I wonder why... I said that to Rinne.
It's like my mouth moved on its own.)

(Well, there's no need for me to act that
way to her. She's my childhood friend, so
of course we're always going to be together.)

(That's right. It's not too late. I'll apologize
to Rinne and ask for forgiveness. I'll say it was
a joke, because I always want to be with her.)

(Today was so fun. If only I can be with
Rinne forever. What a wonderful thought.)

(All of my memories returned, the haze
clearing in a rush.)

(The information overwhelmed me, like
the world was ready to tear into halves.)
Then, we can't really be family, can we?
Rin—

(Rinne muttered softly, and the world
collapsed before my eyes.)
Where am I...? Did I return?
(I think those branches got to me.)

Are you telling me... you broke free from
Eden... with the Paradise Lost?
I couldn't tell you, honestly... But I think so.
I see. You're okay then, Shido.
Huh?
What do you mean?
Wha? What is this?
You broke Paradise Lost. I have nothing left.
Rinne, listen to me.

When we were on our date earlier, it was
the first time I realized how fun dating you
could be. I wish we could be together forever.

Okay, Rinne? I want to be with you. You're
more than family to me. You're the one I
want more than anyone. The one for me!

Even if we leave this world, even if we say
good-bye, it won't change what you mean to
me!

Let's go home together, Rinne. We're
going back to our normal lives. Starting
over from scratch. We don't need Eden!

Don't worry about failure. I'm here.
Everyone's here. You can find happiness
on your own!
Shido...
Rinne, can't you see?

Eden's power has left me. It's unstable.
There's no telling what could happen
from now.
What?! There's nothing you can do?
There is one thing...
Oh! Really? What can I—
Seal me.

That way, the barrier will vanish, and everyone
will return to the normal world. Shido, only
you can do this.

Okay. I need to take the Spirit's power...
But my power only works if the Spirit
opens up to me!

Hahaha... So honest, Shido. You're worried
about that right now?
Don't worry. I hear she likes you...

Okay. Got it! That's how we'll make it home.
You're coming too, right?

Yes... I think... that is the only way we can
be together.
Shido, the time to act is now.
Got it. Then, let's go. Ready?
Wait. A memory came to me.
(Why does Rinne look so sad?)

The core's disappearing. Does this mean we
can go back?
Yes, you may. Eden's role has ended.

(I looked around, and I saw Tohka and the
others waking. They're fatigued, but not
seriously injured.)
I'm glad to see everyone's safe. Hey, wait!
Hahaha...
Rinne, your body. What's going on?

You see, I...I'm the only one who can't go
back with you.
What do you mean? But didn't you say—?

Sorry... I lied. Yes, I needed to say that, or
I thought you wouldn't kiss me.
Well! That may be true, but—!

See, I know you, Shido. You're my childhood
friend.

That's right. You're my childhood friend!
Don't give up! Stay with me! Like how you
used to, and will forever!

That was never true, though. So, from now
on, I won't exist...
You're lying, right...? That can't be true!

Shido, you taught me so much. That with
pleasure... comes pain. But it can be overcome.
The good memories always outweigh the bad.
Wait!

It's fine. You don't have to say anything.
Haha. Sorry. Hm? How weird. I can't see
your face, Shido.
Ha... Hahah... Not with all those tears.

You too, Shido. You're crying too. Hehe.
But I see now... what it means... to cry.
So this is what it's like.

That's right! Rinne, there's still so much to
see! So, so... Please!
Shido, listen to me, would you?
Sure. Anything. What is it?

Our time together... The days we spent...
are precious to me.

It got me thinking. Maybe Eden was a lie,
but the days with you were all true.
True... happiness...

What are you talking about? We're still
together, aren't we? We promised.

Hehe. It warms my heart... to know how
much you think about me. But you might
make the others jealous.
Haha... Good point.

Then, while it's just you and me...
I'm going to say it.
Say what? This is so serious...
You see, this whole time, I...
I loved you, Shido...

Rinne...? Rinne? Rinne...
RIIIIIIINNNNNNNEEEEEEE!
(In that moment, I felt like I was floating.)
